title: martyns
author: martyns
content: We know that the market is dynamic,as in it changes constantly,and as such,an investor who isn't careful enough to know when he is investing will fall in to heart problems or emotional trauma as a result of a massive fall in value,that is why it is important to condition your mind in a way that you won't get heart failure when you are at the loosing end.Every investor knows there is risk in the game,and taking the risk is what shows you are ready to eradicate poverty from your life.

comments.body: You don't need to give up, when you encounter problems in the crypto trading than to apply another strategy that will make you to believe that you can still make it when the bullish market take over. I think, this is the time to face the risk by continue holding your coins until the bearish season is over for traders to embrace incomes.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: If it were me, I would pause to heal the heart problem or emotional trauma rather than continue because health matters are far more important to me. So far, I've been able to handle it pretty well and haven't had that problem and hopefully, I'll never have one because every investment I make has a risk behind it. And luckily, I can deal with it if I have a loss investing or trading so it doesn't take a toll on my health. Maybe I will experience disappointment but it is not prolonged and I can still handle it well.So before you decide to invest or trade, you must prepare your mind as best because the risks we face will follow our every step. If you can handle it, you won't have to worry about the appearance of that health problem and won't even be affected by the loss and just a moment of disappointment.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: OP, if I got your drift well you meant anxiety during trading and not that it's real heart problem. Anyway, anytime you begin to get worked up or needlessly anxious during trading it simply means you're exposing your account more than you should. That's against the ethics of crypto trading which suffices that, "don't risk more than you can afford to lose." Other than that, trading is an enjoyable profession. It doesn't cause any heart issues, though I must add that it's not for the faint hearted.
